Returns:

wantRotate

public boolean wantRotate()
Ask to user if he want rotate. Check the correctness of user answer.

Returns:
true if user wants rotate, else false.

wantPlaceFlag

public boolean wantPlaceFlag()
Ask to user if he want place flag. Check the correctness of the answer.

Returns:

Returns:
